RELEASE_CHANNEL.title: Release Chanel
RELEASE_CHANNEL.description: Select the release channel that is relevant to you. Development releases should not be used on production servers.

SITE_NAME.title: Site Name
SITE_NAME.description: Enter the default name of your website

SITE_DESCRIPTION.title: Site Description
SITE_DESCRIPTION.description: Enter the default meta description for your website

SITE_KEYWORDS.title: Site Keywords
SITE_KEYWORDS.description: Enter the default set of keywords for your website

SITE_AUTHOR.title: Site Author
SITE_AUTHOR.description: Enter the default author of your website

SITE_HOST.title: Site Host
SITE_HOST.description: Enter the HTTP Host name of the website for instance http://www.example.com/index.php would be 'example.com'

SITE_BASE.title: Site Base
SITE_BASE.description: The base path (suffix of document root) of the site for example 'http://www.twist.com/test/index.php' the base would be '/test/' which is the main site root

SITE_WWW.title: Site Use WWW
SITE_WWW.description: Redirect the user to WWW. if they are not already on that sub-doamin. Also used when building the full site URL

SITE_TRAILING_SLASH.title: Site Trailing Slash
SITE_TRAILING_SLASH.description: URIs and URLs in Routes and Structure will have a trailing slash '/' sufix

SITE_PROTOCOL.title: Site Protocol
SITE_PROTOCOL.description: Select the primary protocol for the website

SITE_PROTOCOL_FORCE.title: Force Site Protocol
SITE_PROTOCOL_FORCE.description: Redirect the user to the selected SITE_PROTOCOL

TIMEZONE.title: Timezone
TIMEZONE.description: Set the timzone of your website

DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.title: Default Language
DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.description: Set to the default language ISO code of your site

LANGUAGE_FALLBACK.title: Language Fallback
LANGUAGE_FALLBACK.description: If no content is available in the selected language fall back to default language

ERROR_HANDLING.title: Error Handling
ERROR_HANDLING.description: Error handlers are very important, stops the output of errors to the screen.

ERROR_FATAL_HANDLING.title: Fatal Error Handling
ERROR_FATAL_HANDLING.description: Fatal Error handling to output a more user friendly page in the event of a fatal error.

ERROR_EXCEPTION_HANDLING.title: Exception Handling
ERROR_EXCEPTION_HANDLING.description: Exception handling to output a more user friendly page in the event of a exception.

DEVELOPMENT_MODE.title: Development Mode
DEVELOPMENT_MODE.description: Output full exceptions and allow dumping of variables to screen

MAINTENANCE_MODE.title: Maintenance Mode
MAINTENANCE_MODE.description: Output the 503 SEO friendly maintenance page to all visitors of the website (search engines will not index this page)

PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT.title: PHP Memory Limit
PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT.description: Set the memory limit for all your PHP scripts that use the framework

PHP_MAX_EXECUTION.title: PHP Max Execution
PHP_MAX_EXECUTION.description: Set the max execution time for all your PHP scripts that use the framework

FILE_MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.title: Max Upload Size
FILE_MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.description: Max allowed file size of assets uploaded to the system, PHP Upload and form post limits still apply

TEMPLATE_BASE_OVERRIDE.title: Override Base Dir
TEMPLATE_BASE_OVERRIDE.description: Allow template and element files the are located outside of your base location (doc root) to be loaded

TEMPLATE_PRE_PROCESS_CACHE.title: PreProcess Cache Life
TEMPLATE_PRE_PROCESS_CACHE.description: The amount of time to store a Pre Processed template cache, this cache helps speed up the processing of template

EMAIL_MULTIPART_ENCODING.title: Default Encoding
EMAIL_MULTIPART_ENCODING.description: Set the default encoding type to use when sending emails

EMAIL_CHAR_ENCODING.title: Default Char Encoding
EMAIL_CHAR_ENCODING.description: Set the default char encoding to be used when sending emails

EMAIL_PROTOCOL.title: Email Send Protocol
EMAIL_PROTOCOL.description: Select the protocol to use when sending all emails

EMAIL_SMTP_HOST.title: SMTP Host
EMAIL_SMTP_HOST.description: Set the SMTP Host needed to login to the SMTP email server

EMAIL_SMTP_PORT.title: SMTP Port
EMAIL_SMTP_PORT.description: Set the SMTP Port (Default: 25) needed to login to the SMTP email server

EMAIL_SMTP_USERNAME.title: SMTP Username
EMAIL_SMTP_USERNAME.description: Set the SMTP Username (usually an email address) needed to login to the SMTP email server

EMAIL_SMTP_PASSWORD.title: SMTP Password
EMAIL_SMTP_PASSWORD.description: Set the SMTP Password needed to login to the SMTP email server

FTP_LIBRARY.title: FTP Library
FTP_LIBRARY.description: Choose which connection library the FTP package should use, to use 'native' the ftp_ PHP functions must be installed

SESSION_HANDLER.title: Session Handler
SESSION_HANDLER.description: Choose the PHP session handler to use, 'native' is the default builtin PHP session handler

CACHE_ENABLED.title: Cache Enabled
CACHE_ENABLED.description: Caching of data, templates and pages are handled with the Twist Cache Package. Disabling the cache will return 'null' for all cache requests, no new data will be stored. Cache files can still be removed when disabled

CACHE_GB_PROBABILITY.title: Cache Garbage Collection
CACHE_GB_PROBABILITY.description: Set the probability of a user collecting garbage between 1-10 when and instance of cache is launched. Default is set to 0, will never collect garbage (Expired items deleted when next used)

DATETIME_SOURCE.title: Time Source
DATETIME_SOURCE.description: Choose where the datetime class should obtain its timestamp from

DATABASE_DEBUG.title: Database Debug Mode
DATABASE_DEBUG.description: Capture all queries, who long they took to run and other useful stats

USER_PASSWORD_HASH.title: Strong Password Encryption
USER_PASSWORD_HASH.description: Hash the passwords, this function requires PHP MCRYPT to be installed, More secure and reliable than SHA1

USER_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION.title: Standard Encryption
USER_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION.description: If 'Strong Password Encryption' is set to false then encryption type must be set, Options 'sha1','sha512'

USER_AUTO_AUTHENTICATE.title: Auto Authenticate
USER_AUTO_AUTHENTICATE.description: Automatically try and authenticate the user when the correct post parameters are present

USER_DEFAULT_LOGIN_URI.title: Login URI
USER_DEFAULT_LOGIN_URI.description: Set the URI to your login page

USER_DEFAULT_MEMBER_URI.title: Member Page URI
USER_DEFAULT_MEMBER_URI.description: Set the URI to the first page you come to when logging in

USER_DEFAULT_LOGOUT_URI.title: Logout URI
USER_DEFAULT_LOGOUT_URI.description: Set the URI to your logout page (for example this could be your homepage or you login page)

USER_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH.title: Min Password Length
USER_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH.description: Set the minimum password length to allow

USER_COMMON_PASSWORD_FILTER.title: Common Password Filter
USER_COMMON_PASSWORD_FILTER.description: Stop the user from using any of the top 10,000 most common passwords

USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION.title: Verify Email
USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION.description: Verify a registered user by email before they can login to their account

USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE.title: Password Change
USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE.description: Require an initial password change upon first login

USER_REMEMBER_LENGTH.title: Remember Length
USER_REMEMBER_LENGTH.description: Set the time in Hours (Default: 168, which is 7 Days in Hours)

USER_TEMPLATE_LOCATION.title: Custom Templates
USER_TEMPLATE_LOCATION.description: Optionally you can set the location for custom user templates

USER_LEVEL_MEMBER.title: User Level (Member)
USER_LEVEL_MEMBER.description: Level (integer) of a member user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_ADVANCED.title: User Level (Advanced)
USER_LEVEL_ADVANCED.description: Level (integer) of a advanced user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_ADMIN.title: User Level (Admin)
USER_LEVEL_ADMIN.description: Level (integer) of a admin user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_SUPERADMIN.title: User Level (Super Admin)
USER_LEVEL_SUPERADMIN.description: Level (integer) of a super admin user used to restrict access through routes
